sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b190383083d012100e0f9bc6feaad32b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.togetherAIUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>togetherAIUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var togetherAIUtils = Class.create();
togetherAIUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    API_TOKEN: gs.getProperty('togetherai_api_key'),
    SUMMARIZE_MODEL: gs.getProperty('togetherai_summarize_model'),
    CODE_MODEL: gs.getProperty('togetherai_code_model'),
    KB_MODEL: gs.getProperty('togetherai_knowledge_model'),

    executeRequest: function(restMessageName, prompt, additionalInstructions, model) {
        try {
            var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Together.AI', restMessageName);
            r.setStringParameterNoEscape('apiToken', this.API_TOKEN);
            
            // Get the request body from the REST message
            var requestBody = r.getRequestBody();
            
            // Parse the JSON body
            var bodyObject = JSON.parse(requestBody);
            
            // Update the dynamic parts of the request body
            bodyObject.prompt = prompt + ' ' + additionalInstructions;
            bodyObject.model = model;
            bodyObject.messages[1].content = prompt + ' ' + additionalInstructions;
            
            // Set the updated request body
            r.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(bodyObject));
            
            var response = r.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();

            if (httpStatus == '200' || httpStatus == '201') {
                var aiResponse = JSON.parse(responseBody);
                return aiResponse.choices[0].message.content;
            } else {
                throw new Error("Cannot get a successful response from Together.AI");
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error("Error in togetherAIUtils." + restMessageName + ": " + ex.message);
            return "An error occurred: " + ex.message;
        }
    },

    generateCode: function() {
        var prompt = this.getParameter('sysparm_prompt');
        var content = this.executeRequest('generate_code', prompt, 'Generate code for ServiceNow', this.CODE_MODEL);
        return this.formatCodeBlocks(content);
    },

    generateKnowledge: function() {
        var prompt = this.getParameter('sysparm_prompt');
        return this.executeRequest('generate_knowledge', prompt, 'Please format the article with ITIL best practices in mind.', this.KB_MODEL);
    },

    summarizeIncident: function() {
        var prompt = this.getParameter('sysparm_prompt');
        return this.executeRequest('summarize', prompt, 'Please summarize the ServiceNow incident based on the fields provided, which include Short Description, Description, Work Notes, and Comments', this.SUMMARIZE_MODEL);
    },

    formatCodeBlocks: function(text) {
        var codeBlockRegex = /```[\s\S]*?```/g;
        return text.replace(codeBlockRegex, function(match) {
            return match.replace(/```/g, '').trim();
        });
    },

    type: 'togetherAIUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-25 22:23:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>b190383083d012100e0f9bc6feaad32b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>togetherAIUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b190383083d012100e0f9bc6feaad32b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-25 22:45:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

'; var description = $j('#desc').val(); var short_description = $j('#short_desc').val(); var caller = $j('#caller').val(); var work_notes = $j('#work_notes').val(); var comments = $j('#comments').val(); var incidentData = "Description: " + description + " Short Description: " + short_description + " Work Notes: " + work_notes + " Comments: " + comments; // Call the server script var ga = new GlideAjax('togetherAIUtils'); ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'summarizeIncident'); ga.addParam('sysparm_prompt', incidentData); ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) { if (response && response.length > 0) { handleResponse(response); } else { console.error('Empty response received from server'); handleError('Empty response received from server'); } }, function(error) { console.error('AJAX call failed:', error); handleError('AJAX call failed: ' + error); }); } function handleResponse(response) { // Show the result var loadingDialog = GlideModal.get(); loadingDialog.setTitle("AI Generated Content"); // Update the ai_prompt textarea with the response var aiPromptTextarea = $j('#ai_prompt_response'); if (aiPromptTextarea) { aiPromptTextarea.val(response); $j("#ai_prompt_response").append(response); // Update as success var loadingContainer = document.getElementById('generating-message'); loadingContainer.innerHTML = '${gs.getMessage("Success!")}'; } } function handleError(error) { console.error('Error:', error); var loadingContainer = document.getElementById('generating-message'); loadingContainer.innerHTML = '${gs.getMessage("An error occurred: ")}' + error + ''; }]]>false var gr_inc = new GlideRecord('incident'); gr_inc.addQuery('sys_id', jelly.jvar_sysId); gr_inc.query(); gr_inc; // Retrieve work notes var workNotes = []; var grWorkNotes = new GlideRecord('sys_journal_field'); grWorkNotes.addQuery('element', 'work_notes'); grWorkNotes.addQuery('element_id', jelly.jvar_sysId); grWorkNotes.orderBy('sys_created_on'); grWorkNotes.query(); while (grWorkNotes.next()) { workNotes.push(grWorkNotes.getValue('value')); } // Retrieve comments var comments = []; var grComments = new GlideRecord('sys_journal_field'); grComments.addQuery('element', 'comments'); grComments.addQuery('element_id', jelly.jvar_sysId); grComments.orderBy('sys_created_on'); grComments.query(); while (grComments.next()) { comments.push(grComments.getValue('value')); }
